io.advantageous.qbit.http.server

Class HttpServerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.advantageous.qbit.http.server.HttpServerBuilder

  • public class HttpServerBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows one to build().start() an HTTP server.
